body:
can you post a full bug report as described here? https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md
have you migrated your database to a different database in the past? is this a clean rc1 installation and if not, how old is it? what other 3rdparty apps do you have installed?

every time i try to enable a app i get the database error,  it dosent batter if it is a clean install. i have tried a updrage and a fresh clean install

i have tried 3d party apps, and factory apps. 

i get the same error over and over again.

an exception occurred while executing 'insert into oc_appconfig ( appid, configkey, configvalue ) values( ?, ?, ? )': sqlstate[23000]: integrity constraint violation: 1048 column 'appid' cannot be null

if i disable a factory, i can't re enable it. i keep getting 

i have tried a new database. still same error
sorry but we need more information here. can you please post the full bug report as described here? https://github.com/owncloud/core/blob/master/contributing.md

just discovered ie11 could be the problem, google chrome works

hope this helps

here is the error log

login to any admin account click apps on the left hand bottom, click on any app, click enable, brings up this error log

php virson 5.4.22 
perl version 5.10.1 

ghostdrive.com.au/info.php - this should provide php mysql info
ghostdrive.com.au/serverinfo this will provide a server infomation

ghostdrive.com.au/owncloud - temp,temp2013 login,password

running linux
godaddy server

start log file-----------------------------------------------------------

{"app":"php","message":"undefined index: appid at \/home\/justnait\/public_html\/owncloud\/settings\/ajax\/enableapp.php#7","level":2,"time":"december 04, 2013 03:04:42"}
{"app":"php","message":"invalid argument supplied for foreach() at \/home\/justnait\/public_html\/owncloud\/lib\/private\/installer.php#413","level":2,"time":"december 04, 2013 03:04:42"}
{"app":"php","message":"invalid argument supplied for foreach() at \/home\/justnait\/public_html\/owncloud\/lib\/private\/installer.php#416","level":2,"time":"december 04, 2013 03:04:42"}
{"app":"core","message":"an exception occurred while executing 'insert into `oc_appconfig` ( `appid`, `configkey`, `configvalue` ) values( ?, ?, ? )':\n\nsqlstate[23000]: integrity constraint violation: 1048 column 'appid' cannot be null","level":3,"time":"december 04, 2013 03:04:42"}

end log file-----------------------------------------------------------
